title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka
overview: Follow the dramatic twists and turns in the lives of Mauli, her husband Kunal, and her best friend Nandini. What happens when the unhappily married Nandini realises that the mutual admiration between her and Kunal has turned into fatal attraction? Will friendship be forsaken for love? Will one woman's happiness becomes another woman's heartbreak? Find out in Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka.
